chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Access Control is a client and server authentication and authorization implementation for user and group management.

In the CADC open software repository (https://github.com/opencadc) the Access Control service clients command line are available. This guide explains how to download and run these clients and the available commands. Examples are provided.
